channel.title: Rolemadness Turbo Mafia! (6/12) Mafia Wins!
channel.description:
# Rolemadness Turbo Mafia! An edited version of my Turbo yesterday, slightly larger this time!
Hosted by Luxy Co-Hosted by Marcus If you can suggest me another class that I may have missed, it may be added. # Rules Normal Forum Mafia Rules Apply
# Mechanics Mafia will have a day and night chat. Majority is in effect, if there is no majority there is no lynch. Days will be 20 minutes, Nights will be 10 minutes unless all actions are locked in earlier. There is no maximum number of times a class can be rolled. No classes are guaranteed unless specified by the rolelist. # Roles
[details="Classes"]
> [Color=green] **Alignment Cop** [/color] Every night you may check a player, determining whether they are a member of the mafia or not. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
> [Color=green] **Doctor** [/color] Every night you may heal a player, preventing them from death. You will be informed if you are successful, but your target won't. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
> [Color=green] **2-Shot Vigilante** [/color] Once a night, you may shoot a player killing them. You have 2 bullets. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
>[Color=green] **Tracker** [/color] Every night, you may follow a player, seeing who they visit. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
>[color=green] **Mayor** [/color] Once per game you may reveal yourself as the mayor during the day. Once you are revealed, your vote will count as two and you are unhealable. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
>[color=green] **Non-Consecutive Bodyguard** [/color] Every night you may prevent visits to a player, however, you can't target the same player twice in a row. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
>[color=green] **Roleblocker** [/color] Every night you may target a player, preventing their action for the night. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
>[color=green] **Busdriver** [/color] Every night you may swap the position of two players, causing all players targeting A to target B and vice versa. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
>[color=green] **Strongwiller** [/color] Every night, you can guarantee the success of your target's ability. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
>[color=green] **Parity Cop** [/color] Every night, you may target a player, learning if they are of the same alignment of your previous target. *You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.*
>[color=red] **Godfather** [/color] Every night, you may kill a player. This is the mafia factional kill. You will appear as town to alignment checks. If you die, you will be replaced by another member of the mafia. *You win when the mafia equals or outnumber the town.*
>[color=red] **Consigliere** [/color] Every night, you may check a player, revealing to the mafia their role. *You win when the Mafia equals or outnumbers the town.*
>[color=red] **Stalker** [/color] Every night, you may follow a player, revealing to the mafia who they visited and who visited them. *You win when the Mafia equals or outnumbers the town.*
>[color=red] **Roleblocker** [/color] Every night, you may roleblock a player, preventing their night action. *You win when the Mafia equals or outnumbers the town.*
>[color=red] **Tailor** [/color] Every night, you may target a player, making them appear as the class of your choice to investigatives. *You win when the Mafia equals or outnumbers the town.*
>[color=red] **Redirector** [/color] Every night, you may change someone's target of their night ability. *You win when the Mafia equals or outnumbers the town.* [/details]
# Rolelist [color=green] Alignment Cop / Parity Cop Random Town / Random Town Unaware Miller Random Town Random Town Random Town Random Town Random Town Random Town Random Town [/color] [color=red] Godfather Random Mafia Random Mafia [/color]
# Players
1. ~~Livicus~~ - Died N1 [color=green] Parity Cop [/color] 2. Firekitten 3. PoisonedSquid 4. Nerbins 5. bazingaboy 6. ~~Margaret~~ - Lynched D2 [color=green] 2-Shot Vigilante [/color] 7. Overthebin 8. Gamerpoke 9. ~~MaximusPrime~~ Killed N2 [color=green] Mayor [/color] 10. techwolves 11. Boss110 12. redrabbit

item.title: Rolemadness Turbo Mafia! (6/12) Mafia Wins!
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
I am so, so sorry for going AFK.
It was time for me to go to sleep and my dad pretty much confiscated my phone before I could explain. I should’ve just not joined and let someone else take my slot since I forgot I had to go to bed earlier because school.
Sorry.

Read full topic
